labels.label: Transition - Employed elsewhere, living at MLH

settings.formula: YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR({date04}) - IF(OR(MONTH(TODAY()) < MONTH({date04}), AND(MONTH(TODAY()) = MONTH({date04}), DAY(TODAY()) < DAY({date04}))), 1, 0)

FORMAT_DATE(IF(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH({date04}), DAY({date04})) > TODAY(), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH({date04}), DAY({date04})), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) + 1, MONTH({date04}), DAY({date04}))), "MM/DD/YYYY")
